name: Valley of Fear Virtual Reality
description:
Collect all ancient artifacts to survive in the creepy horrifying place.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

!!! Warning !!!
Do not try to play this game without 3D glasses (any will fit well).
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Collect all ancient artifacts to survive in the creepy horrifying place.

• Deep dive into the terrifying atmosphere. True horror scary game.
• To easy? You have 5 difficulties to choose.
• Different levels. Each has a unique atmosphere.
• Comfortable control.
• Awesome graphics.
